entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
